values: Structured State Spaces for Sequence Modeling (S4)

values.mb_abstract:
In this series of blog posts we introduce the Structured State Space sequence model (S4).
In this first post we discuss the motivating setting of continuous time series, i.e. sequence data sampled from an underlying continuous process, which is characterized by being smooth and very long.
We briefly introduce the S4 model and overview the subsequent blog posts.

values: this demonstrates a fancy link that finds an excerpt and a favicon during compilation.
